sub_title: Cyber & IT audit and risk consulting professional experienced in SOC assessments, IT SOX implementation, Internal Financial Controls, IT Due Diligence, and Internal Audit serving diverse clients across industries.
summary:
A Cyber & IT audit and risk consulting professional, post graduate in Information and Network Security,
experienced in SOC assessments, IT SOX implementation, IT audit support (ITGC and ITAC), IT Due
Diligence, and Internal Audit, testing applications, networks, IT infrastructure, and internal IT controls for clients across banking, financial services, technology, media, and telecommunications industry in accordance with globally accepted standards such as ICFR, AICPA, SSAE, PCAOB, and ISO.

projects.title: OWASP Top 10 educational tool
projects.description:
A manual on OWASP top 10, intended for awareness and knowledge about web application security by demonstrating OWASP top 10 attacks on a web application by building a vulnerable version of that web application and then securing it against OWASP top 10 attacks.
The URL for the web application version vulnerable to injection and sensitive data exposure attack is: https://github.com/umangjain2511/Master-s-FYP-Injection-Attack.git
The URL for the web application version vulnerable to broken authentication and broken access control attack is: https://github.com/umangjain2511/Master-FYP-Broken-attack.git

contributors.headline: Cyber & IT audit and risk consulting professional experienced in SOC assessments, IT SOX implementation, Internal Financial Controls, IT Due Diligence, and Internal Audit serving diverse clients across industries.

projects.title: Online Job Marketplace
projects.description:
This web application can be thought of something as freelancer, upwork, gigster  or something similar. A web application where job providers can post jobs and registered freelancer can apply for that job. Except for real time payment system, all the necessary functionalities of a typical job portal are added to this web application.
The web application was built using Java EE and JSF/HTML.

contributors.headline: Cyber & IT audit and risk consulting professional experienced in SOC assessments, IT SOX implementation, Internal Financial Controls, IT Due Diligence, and Internal Audit serving diverse clients across industries.

projects.title: Secure Chat Service
projects.description: A chat application with end to end encryption that allows 2 parties to mutually generate a session key using strong identification. All the communication that takes place between the 2 parties is then encrypted using this session key. The application also supports end to end encrypted file transfer.

contributors.headline: Cyber & IT audit and risk consulting professional experienced in SOC assessments, IT SOX implementation, Internal Financial Controls, IT Due Diligence, and Internal Audit serving diverse clients across industries.

projects.title: Sarcasm detection in online product reviews
projects.description: used machine learning frameworks and algorithm to train a dataset of product reviews. Then running the algorithm on test dataset which contained a collection of online customer reviews for different products to ultimately detect sarcasm in those reviews.

contributors.headline: Cyber & IT audit and risk consulting professional experienced in SOC assessments, IT SOX implementation, Internal Financial Controls, IT Due Diligence, and Internal Audit serving diverse clients across industries.

profile_positions.description: As an IT Risk & Controls Analyst, I am responsible for supporting process and product owners throughout the business to document, maintain & monitor internal controls in line with the risk appetite of Booking.com, and to maintain the accuracy and quality of their Risk & Control Matrices.
profile_positions.title: IT Risk & Controls Analyst

profile_positions.description:
- Managed and executed Internal Audit engagements with co-sourcing model for multiple BFSI clients
across various domains such as application and data security, user access and password management,
change and incident management, logging and monitoring, patch management, IT BCP/ DR readiness etc., inline with the applicable regulatory requirements.
- Managed and conducted vendor audit assessments for BFSI clients receiving services such as ATM
switches, digital payments, colocation services etc., from third party vendors.
- Planned, executed and conducted multiple SOC 1 and SOC 2 engagements for clients across industries
along with SOC preparedness for first time clients by performing a gap assessment.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Manager - Cyber and IT Risk

profile_positions.description:
• Managed and executed multiple FAIT engagements including planning, agreeing timelines with client, execution and conclusion using EY GAM methodology to conduct the IT audit.
• Extensively worked on understanding the client environment for various applications to perform the ITGCs, IT Application Controls and infrastructure reviews.
• Performed ITGC for change management, user access management and IT operations management for various applications, including ERPs such as Navision, SAP, Oracle etc.
• Managed, planned and executed multiple SOC engagements for clients including SOC 1 and SOC 2 assessments.
• Assisted first time clients in SOC preparedness by performing the gap assessment for entity level controls in domains such as logical access, logical security, physical security, antivirus management etc.
profile_positions.title: Consultant - Technology Risk

profile_positions.description:
• Performed vulnerability assessment of web applications for clients and recommended the remediation/ mitigation measures.
• Performed vulnerability assessment of network (intranet) for clients and delivered detailed reports analysing the impact, severity and remediations for the vulnerabilities.
profile_positions.title: Cyber Security Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Analyst | EY India                                                                                                  26/06/17 - 03/11/17
Risk Advisory Services(RAS), Gurugram, Haryana, India
RESPONSIBILITIES:
Performed IT audits of the software tools and applications used by the clients
Interviewed financial clients(global banks) to gain an understanding of the IT tools and applications used by them for processing and storing of data
Analysed the IT tools, polices and procedures to ensure they were complaint toward risk assurance(RA)
Tested the effectiveness of the IT controls and evaluated the risks associated with them
profile_positions.title: Analyst - Financial Services
